summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2772 for the improvement of Melrose Avenue, from the southerly line of Olive Street on the west to Melrose Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading the same; by paving the same with suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; by constructing and reconstructing concrete sidewalks; by the alteration, construction and reconstruction of sewers and watermains with all appurtenances necessary for the drainage, sewerage, water service and fire protection of said district.
